product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: D | SOLVENT PLANT > D4 | AUTOMATIC SPRINKLER SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved  paint. Pipe joints shall be with grooved couplings. Necesary supports of all kind shall be of vendor's scope. 80 mm NB
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: grade: heavy, standard: IS(indian standard) 1239 Part -1, fittings: elbows, fittings: tees, fittings: flanges, fittings: reduces clamps, fittings: ms support dash fasteners, painting: two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved paint, pipe joints: grooved couplings, support: vendor's scope

original_rows.1: Providing & fixing Cast Iron Y Strainer.
Supply & fixing of SS Water Curtain Nozzle with (K>=71). UL/FM Approved.
Supply, installation, testing & commissioning of CS Gate Valve as per API 600, Class 150  with matching flanges complete with nuts & bolts.

Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved  paint. Pipe joints shall be with grooved couplings. Necesary supports of all kind shall be of vendor's scope.
Supply,Installation of Butterfly valve as per BS :5155 (Wafer type) matching flanges complete with nuts & bolts.. Necessary fittings shall be provided by erection vendor.
Providing & fixing Non return valve (Wafer type) with matching flanges complete with nuts & bolts.
Supply & fixing of Paddle type Flow Switch
Supply,Fixing of Sprinkler Head Pendent type for K factor-80. Temp rating 68 deg C. UL/FM Approved.
